channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI’s “Code Red” Shows Timely Competition In Emerging Models
item.description: Altman sidelines ads and search ambitions to rapidly improve ChatGPT’s speed, reliability, personalization, and honesty.

item.title: Some Social Security recipients to receive 2 monthly benefit checks in December
item.description: SSI recipients will receive two Social Security payments in December 2025 due to a calendar scheduling quirk that moves January's payment to Dec. 31.

item.title: Meet Amar Subramanya, the 46-year-old Google and Microsoft veteran who will now steer Apple’s supremely important AI strategy
item.description: “We are pleased to welcome Amar to Craig’s leadership team and to bring his extraordinary AI expertise to Apple," CEO Tim Cook said in a statement.

item.title: Inside the economics of Candace Owens’ media empire and the Macron lawsuit threatening to unravel it
item.description: The French president and first lady have tapped the firm behind Dominion’s $787.5 million win against Fox News to pursue Owens personally and commerci...

item.title: AI Agents Took Over Giving Tuesday. Here’s What Comes Next.
item.description: Nonprofits leaned on AI agents to survive the Giving Tuesday surge. Leaders say this year marks a turning point in how missions scale.

item.title: Gene Editing Or Gene Silencing: The Therapies Poised To Transform Medicine
item.description: Revolutions in gene therapy are rapidly changing the landscape of modern medicine, forcing society and science alike to confront a pivotal question.

item.title: Nearly half of U.S. truck-driving schools face closure in crackdown on ‘poorly trained drivers’
item.description: The questionable schools were really just “fleecing people out of money” without teaching them the skills they need to get hired or pass the test, tru...

item.title: ‘Metroid Prime 4: Beyond’ Switch 2 Review: C’est Vi-O-La
item.description: It’s taken a long time for us to get 'Metroid Prime 4', and the game is certainly excellent, but did it really need to take 8 years?

item.title: What Is Regenerative Travel? And Who Is Leading The Way In 2026
item.description: We often hear that 'regenerative tourism’ is just a flashy new buzzword, or a rebrand of sustainability. But that couldn't be further from the truth.

item.title: Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez Bezos commit $102.5 million to organizations combatting homelessness across the U.S.: ‘This is just the beginning’
item.description: “It’s a $2 billion commitment,” Sánchez Bezos said. “And we’re going to continue doing it."

item.title: The trade war was never going to fix our deficit
item.description: Trump's tariffs won't alter the trajectory of our national debt or entitlements. For the economy's sake, the Supreme Court should end this abuse of po...

item.title: Musk says AI and robotics are 'only' things that can solve massive US debt crisis
item.description: Elon Musk claims AI and robotics are the only solution to America's $38 trillion debt crisis, predicting dramatic economic changes within three years.

item.title: Apple is making a big shakeup as it looks for an edge in AI

item.title: IRS releases guidance for Trump's 'no tax on tips' and overtime deductions: What to know
item.description: The IRS released new guidance for no tax on tips and overtime deductions under the One Big Beautiful Bill Act. Eligible workers can claim up to $25,00...

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
